comments.body: The rafting trip in the turbulent waters suddenly halted with an unexpected brick wall.
He realized he had a sixth sense in that moment.
He discovered his sixth sense in that moment.
At that instant, he became aware of his sixth sense.
In that moment, he became conscious of his sixth sense.
He realized his sixth sense at that moment.
In that moment, he became aware of his sixth sense.
